snippet: As Hurricane Isaac passed through New Orleans, the Times-Picayune still printed newspapers, but its Web site, Nola.com, became the primary destination for residents seeking storm coverage.
abstract: Times-Picayune in New Orleans printed newspapers as Hurricane Isaac passed through, but its Web site, Nola.com, became the primary destination for residents seeking storm coverage; paper will cut back print publication to three days a week and merge into a new company with the Web site.
lead_paragraph: As Hurricane Isaac passed through New Orleans, the Times-Picayune still printed newspapers, but its Web site, Nola.com, became the primary destination for residents seeking storm coverage.

headline.seo: Times-Picayune’s Hurricane Isaac Coverage Hints at Paper’s Future
headline.main: Storm Coverage Online Hints at Future of Times-Picayune
headline.print_headline: Storm Coverage Hints at Future of Times-Picayune
